item.description:
Join Revolve Nation, the largest community of entrepreneurs in the city of Boston, for this special Fall Networking Event at The Greatest Bar in Boston!

Network with more than 150 of Boston's Leading Entrepreneurs and Innovators

Enjoy Hors D'oeuvres thanks to our sponsors and a Cash Bar

Enjoy a great atmosphere for networking, connecting with Boston leaders, and enjoying the entrepreneurial community at this great vanue (we have the entire 4th Floor to ourselves)


SPONSORED BY:
Revolve, Inc. Accelerate the Revolution
A business accellerator designed to grow businesses from start-up to exit event with a unique combination of business execution, business law, and business capital.
Exemplar Law: No Hourly Bull.
Exemplar is the first law firm in the nation to abandon hourly billing in favor of a fied, value-based pricing model.
item.name: FALL EVENT: Large Group Networking at the Greatest Bar!!
